definitions.he2: old variant of 和[he2]; and; together with; with; sum; union; peace; harmony; Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means 'and' or 'with'; old variant of 和[he2]; harmonious;
definitions.he4: to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence; to join in the singing; to chime in with others;
definitions.hu2: to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards;
definitions.huo2: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water; Taiwan pr. [huo4];
definitions.huo4: to mix (ingredients) together; to blend; classifier for rinses of clothes; classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs;
